reviewText: My daughter fell in love with El Chavo while we were in Mexico for an intensive language course. She loves watching it at home.
My son loves El Chavo Animado, but I am having such a hard time finding the third season, please order more....
my son and i went to mexico and he just fell in love with the show and since its wasn't on tv yet in the US i had to order dvd
Esta serie est basado en los clsicos episodios originales del Chavo. Los episodios son los mismos pero con ms imaginacin y fantasa que en la serie original. Mi hijo y yo lo adoramos.
If you grew up with the original, then this an awesome way to let your kids grow up with the same thing just animated:)
Fast shipping and my brother loved it
Not at all appropriate for my three year old.  Buying this cartoon was not a good decision.  It may be okay for a much older child.
My toddlers favorite show!  I bought this for the car/plane for long travels.
My four year old loves it!
A mi hijo de dos aos le encanta y por diez dlares son muchas horas de ver esta cmica caricatura y la imagen es buena para quien conozca el Chavo le va a encantar

Mi son likes it so much. My wife and I grew up watching Chavo del Ocho in the original format back in the 80's-90's.
My son asked to have his 5th birthday party with "Chavo del Ocho" stuff. So we already did some shopping and this was my pre-gift for him.
He sits for at least 2 hours to watch the episodes.

Buy it, thank me later. Vale la pena comprar los DVD!!
